mapper.select: select NOTICE_SEQ, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, to_char(notice_reg_day,'yyyy.mm.dd') notice_reg_day from "NOTICE" where "NOTICE_SEQ" = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE (notice_seq, notice_title, notice_content, notice_reg_day, admin_seq) values (n_seq.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update NOTICE set notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, notice_content=#{noticeContent} where NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
